name: The Cityview Hong Kong

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at The Cityview for 2 nights at the start of our Chinese holiday and initially I wasn't enthralled by it, but after staying in a tiny awful shoebox on Hong Kong Island at the end of our holiday, I realise I should have given this place a bit more cred.
reviews.title: A decent budget place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We arrived quite late and found reception to be pleasant but not friendly as I had read on so many reviews here. The staff member at the Concierge was completely unfriendly and unhelpful all the time.
reviews.title: Way back from Europe Holiday - Stop Over

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room itself was larger than I expected and was clean, quiet and comfortable. I wouldn't go as far as to say that it was nice, but for Hong Kong standards it is good enough for a couple of nights.
reviews.title: Twas worth the money and very clean!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled solo
reviews.text: Location was quite good - it is so easy to get around Hong Kong that it doesn't matter too much where you are.
reviews.title: Cleaan, Friendly, well-located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel was of a very high standard. The staff were very polite and helpful with nothing too much trouble. The location was a little out of the way but within walking distance to Kowloon Harbour. The breakfast was of a very high standard.
reviews.title: At the Y? Why not!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Its located near an MTR so that was convenient for us. The room was tiny and compact which was kind of expected. Everything was tucked away in drawers, cupboards. The concierge was helpful but cant say the same about the receptionists. We had to pay extra for the Internet which was kind of sad considering that we were in Hong Kong.
reviews.title: Nothing to Brag about

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: This is our third or fourth stay in this hotel. Its location is very good with subway station right outside of the hotel. A supermarket very close by. A short walk will lead us to Women's street. Good congee opposite the hotel. Many other great food around hotel. Easy access to TsimTsa Tsui district for shopping. Very good service. The buffet in the hotel also very good quality. This is why we come back to stay in this hotel again and again.
reviews.title: good location and good service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The weak point i can think of is the bed is a bit narrow. But it's very comfortable so it seems to compensate.
reviews.title: Good service, location and rooms!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled on business
reviews.text: A friend recommended me to this hotel and I was not disappointed. I was there for 4 nights with a young child. The counter lady was really sweet and friendly when we did our check-in. We were given free upgrade and she even brought us to view the rooms personally. We stayed in the newly renovated rooms which were super clean and new. The location of the hotel is near to great eateries, shopping streets/malls and the MTR. The rooms were cleaned everyday. Overall, the experiene was good. Will definitely recommend to other friends and will go back again if I went to HK next time.
reviews.title: Bathroom wasn't clean

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was excited to stay the hotel because on their HP, they said that they recently renew the hotel and the photos were amaizing, but the room I was guided was old one and was pretty much disappointed.
reviews.title: good for a purpose

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Cityview is in an excellent location, 2mins walk from Nathan Rd and MTR station. The hotel is modern and the rooms are clean and tidy. All round great value hotel for Hong Kong
reviews.title: Great value hotel in great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The location of the hotel is good, it's near all, stations, bus stops, restaurants, starbucks, malls, etc. However, the front desk staff was not welcoming at all. Felt like "pay and get out of my face". We reserved a deluxe room, but it was very small, even the bathtub, the room has no shaver, no comb supplied.
reviews.title: worst front desk

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Anyway, When we were disappointed with room, we wanted to see the superior room, the front desk staff said they have no room available immediately, and refuse to let us change to or see any other room. I had to call reservation officer to check the room availability, then I guess the personnel was forced to take us to other room. The staff was not attentive nor helpful in all. Worst front desk ever!
reviews.title: Good location, Average accommodation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The room was clean all in all except the 1st day (hair in bath tub and dirty toilet). When we went out for dinner and came back at night, also found something in our room which werent there before we left, strange~
reviews.title: Fantastic location but a bit ordinary...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We spent 4 nights here, the room was quite small and a bit tired/dated and I can not advise if all rooms were like the one we had or if there has been some refurbishment in any areas of the hotel.
reviews.title: Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009
reviews.text: booked this hotel through booking.com. chose it because of its price and the location which is very near the MTR. True enough, it was just about a minute away from the MTR station. its not like the other hotels near the MTR station but you have to take a long walk to get to the train. Besides this, there are a lot of fast food establishments near the hotel- Kfc, yoshinoya, burger king, 7/11, K store.
reviews.title: Ver good!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Shopping??? you can walk to Mongkok where the Ladies market is and the Sports street where you can find a lot of stores selling rubber shoes. Esprit outlet is also in the area.
reviews.title: All you need

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room??? looks clean, had a good sleep in their bed. there are 2 single beds in the room.
reviews.title: Basic apart from fantastic, quiet location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Service??? housekeeping responded at once.
reviews.title: Great location & value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the hotel a little pricey for what it was, however, apart from the bathroom being a little tired the room (premier/deluxe) was fine, well serviced clean and well maintained. Contrary to other reports we didn't get any noise from other rooms and the staff were helpful. We had a fridge but no mini bar which was great as we could by our own drinks and fill the fridge so that is a definite plus. The hotel is well located just of Nathan Rd which is the main centre of activity in Kowloon and only 100 metres from the underground railyway (MRT). The MRT is easy to use and effiecent - a joy.
reviews.title: Great location is the best I can say!

aka: The Cityview Hong Kong Hotel Hong Kong
description: he Cityview does many things to help protect the environment. We conserve energy and water, reduce waste, and operate in a sustainable manner. Recently, the environmental performance of The Cityview has been recognised by EarthCheck; the travel and tourism industry’s leading environmental management, benchmarking and certification company. Based on the benchmarking assessment report from EarthCheck, in addition to having a Sustainability Policy in place, the indicators on Energy Consumption, Greenhouse Gas Emissions, Portable Water Consumption and Waste Sent to Landfill of the property are at or above the best practice level, which is an achievement to be highly commended.
